smile.plot

Class Hexmap

  • java.lang.Object
    • smile.plot.Shape
      • smile.plot.Plot
        • smile.plot.Hexmap

  • public class Hexmap
extends Plot
    Hexmap is a variant of heat map by replacing rectangle cells with hexagon cells.
    Author:
    Haifeng Li
